entry.title: Russian Airstrike Kills Villagers Taking Shelter at School, Ukraine Says
entry.content: A Russian airstrike is believed to have killed some 60 villagers who had taken refuge in a school in Ukraine’s Luhansk region, authorities there said.

entry.title: How Ukrainian Civilians Helped Win the Battle for Kyiv
entry.content: Villagers shared Google map locations with Ukraine’s military on Russian positions at great risk to themselves, turning a highway into the stage for a Kremlin defeat.

entry.title: Beijing Residents Keep Faith With Government's Zero-Covid Strategy
entry.content: Despite the government’s ratcheting up of virus controls, the mood in China’s capital remains upbeat.
